product.title: Our Hero, Scamp | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Our Hero, Scamp

Disney’s king and queen of canine courtship, Lady and Tramp, are back again. But in this sequel, the story follows their mischievous pup, Scamp. When the couple gives their son permission to play in the park alone, little did they realize that Scamp would be become an instant hero. Not only does Scamp save his new friend Princess from a mob of barking dogs, but he ends up helping police solve a mysterious robbery.

Tie-in Activity: One of the characters in Our Hero, Scamp is a Great Dane, who has a job as a police dog. Explain to your child that some dogs do work, such as rescue dogs, sheep herders, and seeing-eye dogs. Give your child some other examples of dogs on the job. For more ideas, check your local library for books on working dogs.
